anya-e0102n0:5_1: Idāni yāsaṁ lokikābhiññānaṁ vasena ayaṁ samādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṁsāti vuttā,
anya-e0102n0:5_2: tā abhiññā sampādetuṁ yasmā pathavīkasiṇādīsu adhigatacatutthajjhānena yoginā yogo kātabbo.
anya-e0102n0:5_3: Evañhissa sā samādhibhāvanā adhigatānisaṁsā ceva bhavissati thiratarā ca,
anya-e0102n0:5_4: so adhigatānisaṁsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṁ sampādessati.
anya-e0102n0:6_0: Bhagavatā hi adhigatacatutthajjhānasamādhīnaṁ kulaputtānaṁ samādhibhāvanānisaṁsadassanatthañceva uttaruttari
anya-e0102n0:6_1: paṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca “so evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese
anya-e0102n0:6_2: mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti.
anya-e0102n0:6_3: So anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī”tiādinā nayena iddhividhaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:6_7: sattānaṁ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti pañca lokikābhiññā vuttā.
anya-e0102n0:7_0: Tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṁ iddhivikubbanaṁ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā odātakasiṇapariyantesu
anya-e0102n0:7_1: aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā –
anya-e0102n0:10_4: tato āpokasiṇeti evaṁ paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n0:11_0: Odātakasiṇato pana paṭṭhāya tatheva paṭilomakkamena samāpajjanaṁ kasiṇapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:12_1: odātakasiṇatopi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavīkasiṇanti evaṁ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṁ samāpajjanaṁ kasiṇānulomapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:13_0: Paṭhamajjhānato pana paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:15_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānanti evaṁ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṁ samāpajjanaṁ jhānānulomapaṭilomaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:16_0: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṁ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n0:16_2: tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṁ kasiṇaṁ anukkamitvā jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṁ jhānukkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:17_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe,
anya-e0102n0:17_2: tato lohitakasiṇeti iminā nayena jhānaṁ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṁ kasiṇukkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:18_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tato tejokasiṇe tatiyaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:18_2: lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa ca ukkamanaṁ jhānakasiṇukkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:19_0: Pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṁ aṅgasaṅkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:20_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇe…pe…
anya-e0102n0:20_1: tadeva odātakasiṇeti evaṁ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṁ ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:21_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā āpokasiṇe dutiyaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:21_6: odātakasiṇato nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṁ ekantarikavasena aṅgānañca ārammaṇānañca saṅkamanaṁ aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantikaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:22_0: Paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ pana pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṁ tivaṅgikaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:22_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṁ jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṁ aṅgavavatthāpanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:23_0: Tathā idaṁ pathavīkasiṇanti vavatthapetvā idaṁ āpokasiṇaṁ…pe…
anya-e0102n0:23_1: idaṁ odātakasiṇanti evaṁ ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṁ ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n0:23_3: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṁ bhāvanāmukhaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0102n0:24_1: Imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṁ aparidametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṁ sampādessatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
anya-e0102n0:24_6: Uppanne nimitte taṁ vaḍḍhetvā appanādhigamo bhāro,
anya-e0102n0:24_13: satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisantī hoti.
anya-e0102n0:24_14: Therambatthale mahārohaṇaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṁ āgatesu tiṁsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya.
anya-e0102n0:24_17: sace rakkhito nābhavissa sabbe garahappattā assāma ‘nāgarājānaṁ rakkhituṁ nāsakkhiṁsū’ti.
anya-e0102n0:24_18: Tasmā attanā gahetvā vicaritabbaṁ āvudhaṁ nāma malaṁ sodhetvāva gahetvā vicarituṁ vaṭṭatī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:24_19: Te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā tiṁsasahassāpi bhikkhū khippanisantino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0102n0:25_0: Khippanisantiyāpi ca sati parassa patiṭṭhābhāvo bhāro,
anya-e0102n0:25_2: giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya mārena aṅgāravasse pavattite ākāse pathaviṁ māpetvā aṅgāravassaparittārako thero viya.
anya-e0102n0:26_0: Balavapubbayogānaṁ pana buddhapaccekabuddhaaggasāvakādīnaṁ vināpi iminā vuttappakārena bhāvanānukkamena
anya-e0102n0:26_1: arahattapaṭilābheneva idañca iddhivikubbanaṁ aññe ca paṭisambhidādibhedā guṇā ijjhanti.
anya-e0102n0:26_2: Tasmā yathā piḷandhanavikatiṁ kattukāmo suvaṇṇakāro aggidhamanādīhi suvaṇṇaṁ muduṁ kammaññaṁ katvāva karoti,
anya-e0102n0:26_3: yathā ca bhājanavikatiṁ kattukāmo kumbhakāro mattikaṁ suparimadditaṁ muduṁ katvā karoti,
anya-e0102n0:26_4: evameva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahākārehi cittaṁ paridametvā chandasīsacittasīsavīriyasīsavīmaṁsāsīsasamāpajjanavasena
anya-e0102n0:26_5: ceva āvajjanādivasībhāvavasena ca muduṁ kammaññaṁ katvā iddhividhāya yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0102n0:26_6: Pubbahetusampannena pana kasiṇesu catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṁ vaṭṭati.
anya-e0102n0:26_8: taṁ vidhiṁ dassento bhagavā “so evaṁ samāhite citte”tiādimāha.
anya-e0102n0:27_4: Iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena catutthajjhānaṁ paṭilabhitvāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n0:27_15: Vase vattamānaṁ hi cittaṁ mudunti vuccati.
anya-e0102n0:27_18: Muduṁ hi cittaṁ kammaniyaṁ hoti sudantamiva suvaṇṇaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:27_23: yaṁ evaṁ bhāvitaṁ bahulīkataṁ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca,
anya-e0102n0:28_3: Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite.
anya-e0102n0:28_5: Saddhāpariggahitaṁ hi cittaṁ assaddhiyena na iñjati.
anya-e0102n0:28_11: Imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṁ āneñjappattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n0:28_12: Evaṁ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ cittaṁ abhinīhārakkhamaṁ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya.
anya-e0102n0:29_12: Evampi aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ cittaṁ abhinīhārakkhamaṁ hoti abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya pādakaṁ padaṭṭhānabhūtanti.
anya-e0102n0:31_0: 369.Iddhividhāya cittaṁ abhinīharati abhininnāmetīti ettha ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi,
anya-e0102n0:32_6: tassa kho ayaṁ ijjhissati sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā”ti.
anya-e0102n0:33_2: Ijjhantīti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n0:34_2: Sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā satasahassaṁ vā āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti ‘bahuko homī”’ti evaṁ vibhajitvā dassitā
anya-e0102n0:34_3: iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:35_1: “So pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṁ vā…pe…
anya-e0102n0:35_2: vividhampi senābyūhaṁ dassetī”ti evaṁ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbanā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:36_1: “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomaya”nti iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare
anya-e0102n0:36_2: aññasseva manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena pavattattā manomayā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:37_1: Ñāṇuppattito pana pubbe vā pacchā vā taṁkhaṇe vā ñāṇānubhāvanibbatto viseso ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:37_4: arahattamaggena sabbakilesānaṁ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti ñāṇavipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:38_0: Tattha āyasmā bākkulo daharova maṅgaladivase nadiyā nhāpiyamāno dhātiyā pamādena sote patito.
anya-e0102n0:38_2: Tatra taṁ macchabandho gahetvā seṭṭhibhariyāya vikkiṇi.
anya-e0102n0:38_3: Sā macche sinehaṁ uppādetvā ahameva naṁ pacissāmīti phālentī macchakucchiyaṁ suvaṇṇabimbaṁ viya dārakaṁ disvā putto me laddhoti somanassajātā ahosi.
anya-e0102n0:38_4: Iti macchakucchiyaṁ arogabhāvo āyasmato bākkulassa pacchimabhavikassa tena attabhāvena paṭilabhitabbaarahattamaggañāṇānubhāvena
anya-e0102n0:39_1: Tassā citakaṁ āropetvā sūlehi vijjhitvā jhāpiyamānāya dārako sūlakoṭiyā akkhikūṭe pahāraṁ labhitvā saddaṁ akāsi.
anya-e0102n0:39_2: Tato dārako jīvatīti otāretvā kucchiṁ phāletvā dārakaṁ ayyikāya adaṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:39_3: So tāya paṭijaggito vuddhimanvāya pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ pāpuṇi.
anya-e0102n0:39_4: Iti vuttanayeneva dārucitakāya arogabhāvo āyasmato saṁkiccassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:40_1: So dārūnaṁ atthāya sakaṭena aṭaviṁ gantvā dārubhāraṁ katvā sāyaṁ nagaradvārasamīpaṁ patto.
anya-e0102n0:40_2: Athassa goṇā yugaṁ ossajjitvā nagaraṁ pavisiṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:40_3: So sakaṭamūle puttakaṁ nisīdāpetvā goṇānaṁ anupadaṁ gacchanto nagarameva pāvisi.
anya-e0102n0:40_5: Dārakassa vāḷayakkhānucaritepi bahinagare tiyāmarattiṁ arogabhāvo vuttanayeneva ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:41_1: Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṁkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvanibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:41_2: Vuttañhetaṁ “paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇānaṁ pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti samādhivipphārā iddhi…pe…
anya-e0102n0:41_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:42_0: Tattha yadā āyasmato sāriputtassa mahāmoggallānattherena saddhiṁ kapotakandarāyaṁ viharato juṇhāya rattiyā
anya-e0102n0:42_1: navoropitehi kesehi ajjhokāse nisinnassa eko duṭṭhayakkho sahāyakena yakkhena vāriyamānopi sīse pahāramadāsi.
anya-e0102n0:42_2: Yassa meghassa viya gajjato saddo ahosi.
anya-e0102n0:42_3: Tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṁ appesi.
anya-e0102n0:42_4: Athassa tena pahārena na koci ābādho ahosi.
anya-e0102n0:43_0: Sañjīvattheraṁ pana nirodhasamāpannaṁ kālakatoti sallakkhetvā gopālakādayo tiṇakaṭṭhagomayāni saṅkaḍḍhetvā aggiṁ adaṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:44_1: So aññatarasmiṁ araññe rattiṁ samāpattiṁ appetvā nisīdi.
anya-e0102n0:44_2: Pañcasatā corā bhaṇḍakaṁ thenetvā gacchantā “idāni amhākaṁ anupathaṁ āgacchantā natthī”ti vissamitukāmā
anya-e0102n0:44_3: bhaṇḍakaṁ oropayamānā “khāṇuko aya”nti maññamānā therasseva upari sabbabhaṇḍakāni ṭhapesuṁ.
anya-e0102n0:44_4: Tesaṁ vissamitvā gacchantānaṁ paṭhamaṁ ṭhapitabhaṇḍakassa gahaṇakāle kālaparicchedavasena thero vuṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n0:44_5: Te therassa calanākāraṁ disvā bhītā viraviṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:44_8: Te āgantvā vanditvā theragatena pasādena pabbajitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṁ pāpuṇiṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:44_9: Ayamettha pañcahi bhaṇḍakasatehi ajjhotthaṭassa therassa ābādhābhāvo samādhivipphārā iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:45_1: Tassā sirimā nāma gaṇikā issāpakatā tattatelakaṭāhaṁ sīse āsiñci.
anya-e0102n0:45_3: Telaṁ pokkharapattato udakabindu viya vivaṭṭamānaṁ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n0:46_1: Māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo attano dhītāya aggamahesiṭṭhānaṁ patthayamāno tassā vīṇāya āsīvisaṁ pakkhipāpetvā rājānaṁ āha “mahārāja,
anya-e0102n0:46_2: sāmāvatī taṁ māretukāmā vīṇāya āsīvisaṁ gahetvā pariharatī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:46_3: Rājā taṁ disvā kupito sāmāvatiṁ vadhissāmīti dhanuṁ āropetvā visapītaṁ khurappaṁ sannayhi.
anya-e0102n0:46_5: Rājā neva saraṁ khipituṁ na oropetuṁ sakkonto vedhamāno aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n0:46_13: Iti rañño saraṁ muñcituṁ avisahanabhāvo sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n0:47_1: Paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññivihārādikā pana ariyā iddhi nāma. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n0:47_6: Ayañhi cetovasippattānaṁ ariyānaṁyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n0:48_0: Etāya hi samannāgato khīṇāsavo bhikkhu paṭikkūle aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṁ mettāpharaṇaṁ vā dhātumanasikāraṁ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n0:48_1: Appaṭikkūle iṭṭhe vatthusmiṁ asubhapharaṇaṁ vā aniccanti manasikāraṁ vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n0:48_2: Tathā paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlesu tadeva mettāpharaṇaṁ vā dhātumanasikāraṁ vā karonto appaṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n0:48_3: Appaṭikkūlapaṭikkūlesu ca tadeva asubhapharaṇaṁ vā aniccanti manasikāraṁ vā karonto paṭikkūlasaññī viharati.
anya-e0102n0:48_4: Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hotītiādinā nayena vuttaṁ pana chaḷaṅgupekkhaṁ pavattayamāno paṭikkūle
anya-e0102n0:48_5: ca appaṭikkūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjitvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
anya-e0102n0:48_7: Aniṭṭhasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ mettāya vā pharati dhātuso vā upasaṁharatī”tiādinā nayena ayameva attho vibhatto.
anya-e0102n0:48_8: Ayaṁ cetovasippattānaṁ ariyānaṁyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhīti vuccati.
anya-e0102n0:49_1: Pakkhīādīnaṁ pana vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n0:49_3: Sabbesaṁ pakkhīnaṁ sabbesaṁ devānaṁ ekaccānaṁ manussānaṁ ekaccānañca vinipātikānaṁ ayaṁ kammavipākajā iddhī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:49_4: Ettha hi sabbesaṁ pakkhīnaṁ jhānaṁ vā vipassanaṁ vā vināyeva ākāsena gamanaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:49_5: Tathā sabbesaṁ devānaṁ paṭhamakappikānañca ekaccānaṁ manussānaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:49_6: Tathā piyaṅkaramātā yakkhinī uttaramātā phussamittā dhammaguttāti evamādīnaṁ ekaccānaṁ vinipātikānaṁ ākāsena gamanaṁ kammavipākajā iddhīti.
anya-e0102n0:50_1: Cakkavattiādīnaṁ vehāsagamanādikā pana puññavato iddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n0:50_3: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṁ gacchati saddhiṁ caturaṅginiyā senāya antamaso assabandhagobandhapurise upādāya.
anya-e0102n0:50_9: Saṅkhepato pana paripākaṁ gate puññasambhāre ijjhanakaviseso puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:51_0: Ettha ca jotikassa gahapatissa pathaviṁ bhinditvā maṇipāsādo uṭṭhahi.
anya-e0102n0:51_1: Catusaṭṭhi ca kapparukkhāti ayamassa puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:51_3: Ghositassa sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:51_4: Meṇḍakassa ekakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṁ meṇḍakānaṁ pātubhāvo puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:51_10: Tesu seṭṭhissa sīsaṁ nhātassa ākāsaṁ ullokanakāle aḍḍhateḷasakoṭṭhasahassāni ākāsato rattasālīnaṁ pūrenti.
anya-e0102n0:51_11: Bhariyāya nāḷikodanamattampi gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsike parivisamānāya bhattaṁ na khīyati.
anya-e0102n0:51_12: Puttassa sahassatthavikaṁ gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi dentassa kahāpaṇā na khīyanti.
anya-e0102n0:51_13: Suṇisāya ekaṁ vīhitumbaṁ gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsikānampi bhājayamānāya dhaññaṁ na khīyati.

anya-e0102n0:97_0: “Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho citto gahapati āyasmantaṁ mahakaṁ etadavoca ‘sādhu me, bhante,
anya-e0102n0:97_2: Tena hi tvaṁ gahapati āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṁ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṁ okāsehīti. ‘Evaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:97_3: bhante’ti kho citto gahapati āyasmato mahakassa paṭissutvā āḷinde uttarāsaṅgaṁ paññāpetvā tiṇakalāpaṁ okāsesi.
anya-e0102n0:97_4: Atha kho āyasmā mahako vihāraṁ pavisitvā tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi,
anya-e0102n0:97_5: yathā tālacchiggaḷena ca aggaḷantarikāya ca acci nikkhamitvā tiṇāni jhāpesi,
anya-e0102n0:99_2: tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsiṁ ‘ettāvatā brahmā ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca saddañca me sossanti,
anya-e0102n0:99_3: na ca maṁ dakkhissantī’ti antarahito imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsiṁ –
anya-e0102n0:101_0: Bhavaṁ nābhivadiṁ kiñci, nandiñca na upādiyi”’nti. ;
anya-e0102n0:102_1: Tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati seyyathāpi ākāseti ettha tirokuṭṭanti parakuṭṭaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:102_9: Evaṁ gantukāmena pana ākāsakasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya kuṭṭaṁ vā pākāraṁ vā sinerucakkavāḷesupi aññataraṁ
anya-e0102n0:102_10: pabbataṁ vā āvajjitvā kataparikammena ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbo.
anya-e0102n0:103_3: kiṁ hatthiassādīni abhinimminitukāmo hatthiassādi kasiṇāni samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n0:103_4: nanu yattha katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṁ katvā aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:104_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti,
anya-e0102n0:104_7: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati,
anya-e0102n0:105_0: Sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassa antarā pabbato vā rukkho vā uṭṭheti,
anya-e0102n0:105_3: Puna samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhānaṁ hi upajjhāyassa santike nissayaggahaṇasadisaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n0:105_4: Iminā ca pana bhikkhunā ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n0:105_5: Purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānamevetaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:105_6: Aññena iddhimatā nimmite pana paṭhamanimmānaṁ balavaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n0:105_7: Itarena tassa uddhaṁ vā adho vā gantabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:106_3: Evaṁ kātukāmena āpokasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne pathavī udakaṁ hotūti paricchinditvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:106_4: Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinne ṭhāne pathavī udakameva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:107_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṁ karonti,
anya-e0102n0:107_7: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti,
anya-e0102n0:108_5: taṁ taṁ idañcidañca ettakaṁ hotūti āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa yathādhiṭṭhitameva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:108_6: Uddharitvā bhājanagataṁ karontassa sappi sappimeva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:108_11: Tasseva ca sā pathavī udakaṁ hoti sesajanassa pathavīyeva.
anya-e0102n0:108_15: Sace panāyaṁ tesampi udakaṁ hotūti icchati, hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n0:108_16: Paricchinnakālaṁ pana atikkamitvā yaṁ pakatiyā ghaṭataḷākādīsu udakaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:108_17: taṁ ṭhapetvā avasesaṁ paricchinnaṭṭhānaṁ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:109_0: 394.Udakepi abhijjamāneti ettha yaṁ udakaṁ akkamitvā saṁsīdati,
anya-e0102n0:109_3: Evaṁ gantukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ettake ṭhāne udakaṁ pathavī hotūti paricchinditvā
anya-e0102n0:109_5: Saha adhiṭṭhānena yathā paricchinnaṭṭhāne udakaṁ pathavīyeva hoti.
anya-e0102n0:110_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti,
anya-e0102n0:110_7: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati,
anya-e0102n0:111_7: Tasseva ca taṁ udakaṁ pathavī hoti,
anya-e0102n0:111_9: macchakacchapā ca udakakākādayo ca yathāruci vicaranti.
anya-e0102n0:111_10: Sace panāyaṁ aññesampi manussānaṁ taṁ pathaviṁ kātuṁ icchati,
anya-e0102n0:112_2: Evaṁ kātukāmena pana pathavīkasiṇaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya sace nisinno gantumicchati,
anya-e0102n0:112_3: pallaṅkappamāṇaṁ ṭhānaṁ paricchinditvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:112_5: sace padasā gantukāmo hoti maggappamāṇanti evaṁ yathānurūpaṁ ṭhānaṁ paricchinditvā vuttanayeneva pathavī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:113_7: So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
anya-e0102n0:113_8: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyaṁ caṅkamantipi…pe…
anya-e0102n0:113_10: evameva so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi…pe…
anya-e0102n0:114_0: Ākāse gantukāmena ca bhikkhunā dibbacakkhulābhināpi bhavitabbaṁ. Kasmā?
anya-e0102n0:114_5: Pādakajjhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ākāso hotūti parikammaṁ katvā adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:114_9: tena yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ ākāso hotūti adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n0:115_0: Apica okāse orohaṇatthampi iminā dibbacakkhulābhinā bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:115_1: ayañhi sace anokāse nhānatitthe vā gāmadvāre vā orohati.
anya-e0102n0:115_3: Tasmā dibbacakkhunā passitvā anokāsaṁ vajjetvā okāse otaratīti.
anya-e0102n0:116_1: Imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatīti ettha candimasūriyānaṁ
anya-e0102n0:116_3: tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā.
anya-e0102n0:116_4: Evaṁ upari caraṇaālokakaraṇehi vā mahiddhike teneva mahānubhāve.
anya-e0102n0:117_1: parimajjatīti idha so iddhimā cetovasippatto candimasūriye āvajjati,
anya-e0102n0:117_5: So nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
anya-e0102n0:117_6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṁ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti parimajjanti,
anya-e0102n0:118_2: yadi pana idheva nisinnako vā nipannako vā parāmasitukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n0:118_4: adhiṭṭhānabalena vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṁ viya āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite vā parāmasati,
anya-e0102n0:121_0: Ekasmiṁ kira samaye anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati bhagavato dhammadesanaṁ sutvā “sve, bhante,
anya-e0102n0:121_1: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṁ amhākaṁ gehe bhikkhaṁ gaṇhathā”ti nimantetvā pakkami.
anya-e0102n0:121_2: Bhagavā adhivāsetvā taṁdivasāvasesaṁ rattibhāgañca vītināmetvā paccūsasamaye dasasahassilokadhātuṁ olokesi.
anya-e0102n0:121_3: Athassa nandopanando nāma nāgarājā ñāṇamukhe āpāthamāgacchi.
anya-e0102n0:121_5: atthi nu kho assa upanissayo”ti āvajjento “ayaṁ micchādiṭṭhiko tīsu ratanesu appasannoti disvā ko nu
anya-e0102n0:121_6: kho imaṁ micchādiṭṭhito viveceyyā”ti āvajjento mahāmoggallānattheraṁ addasa.
anya-e0102n0:122_0: Tato pabhātāya rattiyā sarīrapaṭijagganaṁ katvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi – “ānanda,
anya-e0102n0:122_1: pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ ārocehi tathāgato devacārikaṁ gacchatī”ti.
anya-e0102n0:122_3: So dibbaratanapallaṅke dibbena setacchattena dhāriyamānena tividhanāṭakehi ceva nāgaparisāya ca parivuto
anya-e0102n0:122_4: dibbabhājanesu upaṭṭhāpitaṁ annapānavidhiṁ olokayamāno nisinno hoti.
anya-e0102n0:122_6: tathā katvā tassa vitānamatthakeneva pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṁ tāvatiṁsadevalokābhimukho pāyāsi.
anya-e0102n0:123_0: Tena kho pana samayena nandopanandassa nāgarājassa evarūpaṁ pāpakaṁ diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti –
anya-e0102n0:123_1: “ime hi nāma muṇḍakā samaṇakā amhākaṁ uparūparibhavanena devānaṁ tāvatiṁsānaṁ bhavanaṁ pavisantipi nikkhamantipi,
anya-e0102n0:123_2: na dāni ito paṭṭhāya imesaṁ amhākaṁ matthake pādapaṁsuṁ okirantānaṁ gantuṁ dassāmī”ti uṭṭhāya sinerupādaṁ
anya-e0102n0:123_3: gantvā taṁ attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā sineruṁ sattakkhattuṁ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇaṁ katvā tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ
anya-e0102n0:124_0: Atha kho āyasmā raṭṭhapālo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “pubbe, bhante,
anya-e0102n0:124_9: na vejayantassa pāsādassa upari dhajaṁ passāmī”ti. “Ayaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:124_11: nandopanando nāma nāgarājā tumhākaṁ kupito sineruṁ sattakkhattuṁ bhogehi parikkhipitvā upari phaṇena paṭicchādetvā andhakāraṁ katvā ṭhito”ti.
anya-e0102n0:124_15: Atha kho āyasmā bhaddiyo āyasmā rāhuloti anukkamena sabbepi bhikkhū uṭṭhahiṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:125_3: Thero attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā mahantaṁ nāgarājavaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā nandopanandaṁ cuddasakkhattuṁ bhogehi
anya-e0102n0:125_4: parikkhipitvā tassa phaṇamatthake attano phaṇaṁ ṭhapetvā sinerunā saddhiṁ abhinippīḷesi.
anya-e0102n0:125_6: Theropi na tuyhaṁyeva sarīre dhūmo atthi,
anya-e0102n0:125_11: Theropi na tuyhaṁyeva sarīre aggi atthi,
anya-e0102n0:125_15: Nāgarājā ayaṁ maṁ sinerunā abhinippīḷetvā dhūmāyati ceva pajjalati cāti cintetvā “bho tvaṁ kosī”ti paṭipucchi.
anya-e0102n0:126_0: Thero taṁ attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā tassa dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotena pavisitvā vāmakaṇṇasotena nikkhami,
anya-e0102n0:126_5: Thero mukhena pavisitvā antokucchiyaṁ pācīnena ca pacchimena ca caṅkamati.
anya-e0102n0:126_9: cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā, tiṭṭhatu, bhante,
anya-e0102n0:126_11: ahaṁ nandopanandasadisānaṁ nāgarājānaṁ satampi sahassampi satasahassampi dameyya”nti āha.
anya-e0102n0:127_0: Nāgarājā cintesi “pavisanto tāva me na diṭṭho,
anya-e0102n0:127_1: nikkhamanakāle dāni naṁ dāṭhantare pakkhipitvā saṅkhādissāmī”ti cintetvā nikkhama bhante,
anya-e0102n0:127_2: mā maṁ antokucchiyaṁ aparāparaṁ caṅkamanto bādhayitthāti āha.
anya-e0102n0:127_4: Nāgarājā ayaṁ soti disvā nāsavātaṁ vissajji.
anya-e0102n0:127_7: Avasesā bhikkhū kira ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyāni kātuṁ sakkuṇeyyuṁ,
anya-e0102n0:127_8: imaṁ pana ṭhānaṁ patvā evaṁ khippanisantino hutvā samāpajjituṁ na sakkhissantīti tesaṁ bhagavā nāgarājadamanaṁ nānujāni.
anya-e0102n0:128_0: Nāgarājā “ahaṁ imassa samaṇassa nāsavātena lomakūpampi cāletuṁ nāsakkhiṁ,
anya-e0102n0:128_2: Thero attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā supaṇṇarūpaṁ abhinimminitvā supaṇṇavātaṁ dassento nāgarājānaṁ anubandhi.
anya-e0102n0:128_3: Nāgarājā taṁ attabhāvaṁ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā “bhante,
anya-e0102n0:128_4: tumhākaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī”ti vadanto therassa pāde vandi.
anya-e0102n0:128_6: ehi gamissāmā”ti nāgarājānaṁ damayitvā nibbisaṁ katvā gahetvā bhagavato santikaṁ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n0:128_10: nāgarājā”ti vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto anāthapiṇḍikassa nivesanaṁ agamāsi.
anya-e0102n0:129_2: Moggallānassa ca nandopanandassa ca saṅgāmo ahosīti. Kassa, bhante, jayo,
anya-e0102n0:129_8: sattāhaṁ therassa sakkāraṁ karissāmī”ti vatvā sattāhaṁ buddhapamukhānaṁ pañcannaṁ bhikkhusatānaṁ mahāsakkāraṁ akāsi.
anya-e0102n0:129_9: Iti imaṁ imasmiṁ nandopanandadamane kataṁ mahantaṁ attabhāvaṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ “yadā mahantaṁ attabhāvaṁ karoti,
anya-e0102n0:129_11: Evaṁ vuttepi bhikkhū upādiṇṇakaṁ nissāya anupādiṇṇakameva vaḍḍhatīti āhaṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:130_0: So evaṁ katvā na kevalaṁ candimasūriye parāmasati.
anya-e0102n0:130_1: Sace icchati pādakathalikaṁ katvā pāde ṭhapeti,
anya-e0102n0:130_7: Anekesupi hi bhikkhusatasahassesu evaṁ karontesu tesañca ekamekassa tatheva ijjhati.
anya-e0102n0:130_9: Yathā hi pātisahassesu udakapūresu sabbapātīsu ca candamaṇḍalāni dissanti.
anya-e0102n0:130_10: Pākatikameva ca candassa gamanaṁ ālokakaraṇañca hoti.
anya-e0102n0:131_1: Kāyena vasaṁ vattetīti tattha brahmaloke kāyena attano vasaṁ vatteti.
anya-e0102n0:132_1: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n0:132_10: Dibbena cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n0:132_11: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṁ suṇāti.
anya-e0102n0:132_13: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n0:132_16: kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmetvā kāyavasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:132_17: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n0:132_20: Cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmetvā cittavasena kāyaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:132_21: So tassa brahmuno purato rūpaṁ abhinimmināti manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapañcaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:132_33: Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n0:132_36: nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati,
anya-e0102n0:132_39: Yaṁ yadeva hi so iddhimā karoti,
anya-e0102n0:133_0: Tattha dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātīti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dūre devalokaṁ vā brahmalokaṁ vā āvajjati santike hotūti.
anya-e0102n0:133_1: Āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti santike hotūti,
anya-e0102n0:134_0: Tattha ko dūraṁ gahetvā santikaṁ akāsīti? Bhagavā.
anya-e0102n0:134_1: Bhagavā hi yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne devalokaṁ gacchanto yugandharañca sineruñca santike katvā pathavītalato
anya-e0102n0:134_2: ekapādaṁ yugandhare patiṭṭhapetvā dutiyaṁ sinerumatthake ṭhapesi.
anya-e0102n0:134_5: Thero hi sāvatthito bhattakiccaṁ katvā nikkhantaṁ dvādasayojanikaṁ parisaṁ tiṁsayojanaṁ saṅkassanagaramaggaṁ saṅkhipitvā taṅkhaṇaññeva sampāpesi.
anya-e0102n0:135_1: Dubbhikkhasamaye kira therassa santikaṁ pātova satta bhikkhusatāni āgamaṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:135_2: Thero “mahā bhikkhusaṅgho kuhiṁ bhikkhācāro bhavissatī”ti cintento sakalatambapaṇṇidīpe adisvā “paratīre
anya-e0102n0:135_3: pāṭaliputte bhavissatī”ti disvā bhikkhū pattacīvaraṁ gāhāpetvā “ethāvuso,
anya-e0102n0:135_4: bhikkhācāraṁ gamissāmā”ti pathaviṁ saṅkhipitvā pāṭaliputtaṁ gato.
anya-e0102n0:135_9: mahallakattherā nāma dūrepi gahetvā santike karontīti.
anya-e0102n0:135_11: antarā ekaṁ nīlamātikaṁ atikkamitvā āgatatthāti? Āma, bhante.
anya-e0102n0:136_1: evaṁ tissadattattheropi sāyanhasamaye nhāyitvā katuttarāsaṅgo mahābodhiṁ vandissāmīti citte uppanne santike akāsi.
anya-e0102n0:137_0: Santikaṁ pana gahetvā ko dūramakāsīti? Bhagavā.
anya-e0102n0:137_1: Bhagavā hi attano ca aṅgulimālassa ca antaraṁ santikampi dūramakāsīti.
anya-e0102n0:138_2: Rājagahe kira nakkhattadivase pañcasatā kumāriyo candapūve gahetvā nakkhattakīḷanatthāya gacchantiyo bhagavantaṁ disvā kiñci nādaṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:138_3: Pacchato āgacchantaṁ pana theraṁ disvā amhākaṁ thero eti pūvaṁ dassāmāti sabbā pūve gahetvā theraṁ upasaṅkamiṁsu.
anya-e0102n0:139_2: Mahākassapatthero kira sattāhaṁ samāpattiyā vītināmetvā daliddasaṅgahaṁ karonto kākavaliyassa nāma duggatamanussassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n0:139_3: Tassa jāyā theraṁ disvā patino pakkaṁ aloṇambilayāguṁ patte ākiri.
anya-e0102n0:139_4: Thero taṁ gahetvā bhagavato hatthe ṭhapesi.
anya-e0102n0:140_4: Tathā hi mahāanuḷatthero nāma sambahule bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā sukkhabhattameva labhitvā gaṅgātīre nisīditvā
anya-e0102n0:140_5: paribhuñjamāne disvā gaṅgāya udakaṁ sappimaṇḍanti adhiṭṭhahitvā sāmaṇerānaṁ saññaṁ adāsi.
anya-e0102n0:141_0: Dibbenacakkhunāti idheva ṭhito ālokaṁ vaḍḍhetvā tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati.
anya-e0102n0:141_1: Idheva ca ṭhito sabbaṁ tassa bhāsato saddaṁ suṇāti.
anya-e0102n0:141_3: Kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmetīti karajakāyassa vasena cittaṁ pariṇāmeti.
anya-e0102n0:141_7: Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti pādakajjhānārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṁ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamati pavisati phasseti sampāpuṇāti.
anya-e0102n0:141_10: Sāyeva ca saññā nīvaraṇehi ceva vitakkādīhi paccanīkehi ca vimuttattā lahusaññātipi veditabbā.
anya-e0102n0:141_11: Taṁ okkantassa panassa karajakāyopi tūlapicu viya sallahuko hoti.
anya-e0102n0:141_12: So evaṁ vāyukkhittatūlapicunā viya sallahukena dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:141_13: Evaṁ gacchanto ca sace icchati pathavīkasiṇavasena ākāse maggaṁ nimminitvā padasā gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:141_14: Sace icchati vāyokasiṇavasena vāyuṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā tūlapicu viya vāyunā gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:141_16: “Sati hi gantukāmatāya” evaṁ katacittādhiṭṭhāno adhiṭṭhānavegukkhittova so issāsakhittasaro viya dissamāno gacchati.
anya-e0102n0:142_0: Cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmetīti kāyaṁ gahetvā citte āropeti.
anya-e0102n0:142_3: Sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti rūpakāyārammaṇena iddhicittena sahajātaṁ sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamatīti.
anya-e0102n0:142_6: Evaṁ adissamānena kāyena gacchanto panāyaṁ kiṁ tassa adhiṭṭhānacittassa uppādakkhaṇe gacchati,
anya-e0102n0:142_7: udāhu ṭhitikkhaṇe bhaṅgakkhaṇe vāti vutte tīsupi khaṇesu gacchatīti thero āha.
anya-e0102n0:142_8: Kiṁ pana so sayaṁ gacchati nimmitaṁ pesetīti.
anya-e0102n0:143_3: Sace iddhimā caṅkamati nimmitopi tattha caṅkamatītiādi sabbaṁ sāvakanimmitaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:143_4: Buddhanimmito pana yaṁ yaṁ bhagavā karoti,
anya-e0102n0:143_7: Ettha ca yaṁ so iddhimā idheva ṭhito dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati,
anya-e0102n0:143_11: Yampi so idheva ṭhito tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati,
anya-e0102n0:143_15: Yampi so dissamānena vā adissamānena vā kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0102n0:143_17: Yañca kho so tassa brahmuno purato rūpaṁ abhinimminātītiādinā nayena vuttavidhānaṁ āpajjati,
anya-e0102n0:143_19: Sesaṁ panettha kāyena vasaṁ vattanāya pubbabhāgadassanatthaṁ vuttanti ayaṁ tāva adhiṭṭhānā iddhi.
anya-e0102n0:144_1: Vikubbanaṁ tāva karontena “so pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti,
anya-e0102n0:144_17: vividhampi senābyūhaṁ dassetī”ti evaṁ vuttesu kumārakavaṇṇādīsu yaṁ yaṁ ākaṅkhati,
anya-e0102n0:144_19: Adhiṭṭhahantena ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato abhiññāpādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya attano kumārakavaṇṇo āvajjitabbo.
anya-e0102n0:144_20: Āvajjitvā parikammāvasāne puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya evarūpo nāma kumārako homīti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:144_21: Saha adhiṭṭhānacittena kumārako hoti devadatto viya.
anya-e0102n0:145_0: Hatthimpi dassetītiādi panettha bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:145_1: Tattha hatthī homīti anadhiṭṭhahitvā hatthī hotūti adhiṭṭhātabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n0:146_0: 399.Manomayaṁ kātukāmo pana pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāyaṁ tāva āvajjitvā vuttanayeneva susiro hotūti adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n0:146_2: Athassa abbhantare aññaṁ kāyaṁ āvajjitvā parikammaṁ katvā vuttanayeneva adhiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n0:146_4: So taṁ muñjamhā īsikaṁ viya kosiyā asiṁ viya karaṇḍāya ahiṁ viya ca abbāhati.
anya-e0102n0:146_5: Tena vuttaṁ “idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n0:146_7: tassa evamassa ayaṁ muñjo ayaṁ īsikā,
anya-e0102n0:146_10: Ettha ca yathā īsikādayo muñjādīhi sadisā honti,
anya-e0102n0:146_11: evaṁ manomayarūpaṁ iddhimatāsadisameva hotīti dassanatthaṁ etā upamā vuttāti.
